```python
def max_sum_subarray(arr):
    max_sum = float('-inf')
    curr_sum = 0
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        curr_sum += arr[i]
        max_sum = max(max_sum, curr_sum)
        if curr_sum < 0:
            curr_sum = 0
    return max_sum
```
